text: Louis VI may refer to: * Louis VI of France, "the Fat" (1081–1137) * Louis VI the Roman (1328–1365), Duke of Bavaria and Elector of Brandenburg * Louis VI, Elector Palatine (ruled 1576–1583) * Louis VI of Hesse-Darmstadt (ruled 1661–1678) * Louis VI, Prince of Condé (1756–1830).
title: Louis VI
